amendment.description: Amendment sought to shift funding for the 2005 round of base closures into accounts that would be used to finish the cleanup of installations closed in previous rounds.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in the Congressional Record to increase the funding for the BRAC 1990 account by $351,000,000 from $377,827,000 to $732,827,000. The account for BRAC 2005 would be reduced by $351,000,000 as an offset.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 171 - 254 (Roll no. 225).
